sourcesContent:
const green = '#53B21F'

//acts as a theme switcher + global variables
export const theme = {
    fonts: {
        main: 'DM Sans', //fonts located in header file
        header: 'Din',
        reading: '2rem',
    },
    padding: '2.5rem',
    maxWidth: '1100px',
    midWidth: '768px',
    smWidth: '640px',
    colors: {
        primary: '#D3B927',
        secondary: '#47991A',
        block: '#b2236d',
        icon: '#80F342',
        text: '#222',
        textActive: '#000',
        grey: '#ccc',
        background: '#fff',
        navBackground: '#fff',
        success: 'green',
        disabled: '#888',
        danger: '#cf2317',
        warning: 'yellow',
        info: 'teal',
        light: '#fff',
        dark: '#000',
    },
}

export default theme
